nodes.bodyText: I think this is tab versus space spacing, which would be good to fix.
Is red really the best choice, given that some people can't see it?

        Suggested change
I'm not sure about this name, as it took me a second to realise what it meant.
Do you have a suggestion? Its not necessarily a new board, not necessarily a loaded board. updateUiForFreshBoard...
refreshBoardSettings? Not super fitting, but better. refreshBoardUI?
Why are you removing the original side of things?
